item.title: Protect your Office 365 emails with the latest Dropsuite cloud solution
item.description:
Smaller businesses can access Dropsuite’s email backup and archiving tool for Microsoft Office 365 through intermediary companies like Ozhosting in Australia and ICONZ-Webvisions in Singapore. Dropsuite’s CEO, Charif Elansari, emphasized their commitment to developing user-friendly solutions that are easy for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to buy and use. Ozhosting CEO, Doug Endersbee, expressed satisfaction in offering Dropsuite’s comprehensive email archiving service, which meets legal requirements for retaining records, to their customers...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/protect-your-office-365-emails-with-the-latest-dropsuite-cloud-solution/
